General.Name: Cover Technologies Inc
General.Description: Plascred Circular Innovations Inc., a green technology company, engages in the recycling of plastic and waste plastic in North America and internationally. The company was formerly known as Cover Technologies Inc. and changed its name to Plascred Circular Innovations Inc. in August 2023. Plascred Circular Innovations Inc. was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 789 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1H2

3.Name: Ms. Gillian  Holcroft B.Eng., M.Eng.
3.Title: Pres & CEO of Mag One Operations
